titles: Libellus de memoria, verissimaque bene recordandi scientia. Authore G.P. Cantabrigiense. Huc accessit eiusdem admonitiuncula ad A. Disconum [sic], de artificiosæ memoriæ, quam publicè profitetur, vanitate
author: G. P., Cantabrigiensis.
Perkins, William, 1558-1602, attributed name.
notes: Includes a reply to: Dickson, Alexander.  De umbra rationis et judicii.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Dickson, Alexander, fl. 1583. --  De umbra rationis et judicii --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
